item.title: question for immigrants in the UK who’s not planning to stay here forever: are you contributing to/maxxing pension? is it worth it? what are the things I need to be aware of/consider? I see/hear conflicting things from ppl ard me so I’m asking the wisdom of the crowd
item.dc:creator: @quantymacro

item.title:
the multiplication table 12 has always been hard for me. for the life of me I can’t memorise it. I only can memorise up until 12x5=60. if I wanna calculate 12x8, I have to do 12x5 + 12 + 12 + 12=96 in my head to get the answer.
I’m a quant btw
item.dc:creator: @quantymacro
item.description:

item.title:

but don’t bother joining systematic macro kids it doesn’t make money go join HFT instead

item.title: it's actually insane that we're in Jan 2025, & they're opening app for 2026 Summer. the competition must be crazy high that it gets to this point. cant help but to wonder if this is optimal in terms of hiring though. but anyways Steve Cohen is a billionaire & I'm a sub seller so

item.title:
Okay LASSO is meh, but what makes Ridge good? what made me fell in love with ridge
new year, another year where I will run thousands of Ridge Regressions. if you're not part of the Church of Ridge Penalty, it's still not too late to join
as usual giving access to some who RT

item.title: these trend/carry papers are quite old/possibly outdated, but I think they’re quite decent for those starting out. 3 yrs ago (I’m old now 😭) I tried replicating these papers as my personal projects. idt you can find them online so gotta find someone who can hook you up. gl

item.title:
YTD Sharpe: 65.2
looking for a senior PM role. minimum 5mm guaranteed. payout >30%. no nickel and dime in terms of costs pls we are all adults here. if you’re even thinking about negotiating means you can’t afford it. DM open
